name: Ogre Quest Winter Dungeon (Dungeon Warrior Remix) Scratch
name_original: Ogre Quest Winter Dungeon (Dungeon Warrior Remix) Scratch
description:
https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/425969592/

Welcome to Dungeon Warrior 2!
PLAY THE FIRST ONE!!!
You have been captured by a massive creature, trapped in its hammer. You throw the hammer off yourself and escape into another part of the dungeon!
What secrets does this dungeon hold. . .

Arrow Keys to move and space to attack, press the phone for mobile, touch the door to enter the next level, double click restart of you die, and Please leave a ❤️!
I'd appreciate if you gave it a ⭐!
If it's too difficult, you can heal with the H key, but I wouldn't recommend it.
https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/205860686/

Enough ❤️s and I'll make part three!
At least I might. . .

#games

Gracias a endermanpizza888 por el proyecto original Dungeon Warrior 2.

An other demo of Psinneapple Games
